name: CrazyFrog
description:
Hello everyone! I have created my first own game and decided to show you it. 

I tried to make fun and memorable game. It's my first experience in developing games and i think it is pretty good. Anyway, i will thank you if you play and rate this game.

Special Thanks to:

Pixel Frog and Kenney for graphics.

George Zinger for testing and music.
